name: Flappy Corona
description:
This Game Is Only For Entertainment.

You can Play whenever You are Bored sitting at Home. Enjoy And try to beat Yourself with The Score.

It is Tap-Tap Game you have pass out the player from the space between the Pipes to get Points.

Play With Friends Challenge them and Win.. Share your Score on Instagram Tagging me to Get Feature @kushalbaidyt.

Good Luck Best Wishes from KUSHAL BAID.

CEO & CO-FOUNDER OF KUSHAL GAMES.
